pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple Methods for Calculating Value at Risk and Expected Shortfall // Enables the user to calculate Value at Risk (VaR) and Expected Shortfall (ES) by means of various types of historical simulation. Currently plain-, age-, volatility- weighted- and filtered historical simulation are implemented in this package. Volatility weighting can be carried out via an exponentially weighted moving average model (EWMA) or other GARCH-type models. The methods of the package are described in Gurrola-Perez, P. and Murphy, D. (2015) https://EconPapers.repec.org/RePEc:boe:boeewp:0525.
